                                                       throws QueryException
        For display center abbreviation and platform should be combined as
        +\n+
        Returns:

        Parameters:
        diseaseAbbr -

                                                               throws QueryException
        Parameters:

        date - format "yyyy-MM-dd"

      • currSampleMetadataByDisease

        public static org.json.JSONObject currSampleMetadataByDisease(java.lang.String diseaseAbbr)
                                                       throws QueryException
        ATTENTION: can return big dataset for some diseases (> 1000 samples and 42K rows for brca on Feb.13, 2014)
        Parameters:
        diseaseAbbr - - disease abbreviation
        Returns:
        list of sample's metadata: sample barcode, tissue source site (TSS) abbreviation, TSS name, sample type code, sample type description, data type, platform, level, and version
        Throws:
        QueryException

      • sampleMetadataByDiseaseDate

        public static org.json.JSONObject sampleMetadataByDiseaseDate(java.lang.String diseaseAbbr,
                                              java.lang.String date)
                                                       throws QueryException
        Returns a snapshot for a data available for a particular date.
        Parameters:
        diseaseAbbr -
        date - is in format: yyyy-MM-dd
        Returns:
        a subset of data that was created before or in the date specified and not archived before this date.
        Throws:
        QueryException
